title: Elrond, Herald to Gil-galad (3R13)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Ally • Home 3 • Elf

Vitality:	4

Game Text:	At the start of each of your turns, you may spot an ally whose home is site 3 to heal that ally twice. Regroup: Exert Elrond twice to heal a companion.
Lore:	“Venerable he seemed as a king crowned with many winters, and yet hale as a tried warrior….”
